mapper.insert: insert into task (task_id, title, days, price, created_user_id, created_time, pid, code) values (#{taskId}, #{title}, #{days}, #{price}, #{createdUserId}, #{createdTime}, #{pid}, #{code})
mapper.select: select task.ids, task.task_id, title, days, price, created_user_id, real_name as created_user_name, created_time, pid, code, detail from task left join user_info create_user on created_user_id=user_id left join task_detail on task.task_id=task_detail.task_id where task.task_id=#{taskId}
